# Introduction to the Practical Session

Welcome to the hands-on component of Day 1! In this session, we'll set up our working environment and start interacting with Large Language Models.

## Learning Objectives

- Set up a Python environment suitable for LLM applications
- Learn basic version control practices with Git
- Explore the HuggingFace ecosystem
- Access and interact with LLMs through APIs

## Prerequisites

- Basic Python knowledge
- A GitHub account (for version control)
- An internet connection
